name: Surging Sacred Chalice
desc: Conches were often favored materials in ancient Fontainian civilization for making ritual implements, and the sacred unguents within this conch chosen as a sanctified chalice have finally emerged. Symbolically, this chalice is the primordial word, the oils are the honed will, and the holy sword itself is reason, which breaks through all.

value.name: Drained Conch Cup
value.desc: An ancient conch container, and it can perhaps be traced back to an even older civilization.

value.name: Sword of Narzissenkreuz
value.desc: A sword whose power faded when the story ended. It will now embark upon a new journey with the power that remains within it, which commemorates a certain great dream.

customize.name: Drained Conch Cup
customize.desc: An ancient conch container, and it can perhaps be traced back to an even older civilization.

customize.name: Surging Sacred Chalice
customize.desc: Conches were often favored materials in ancient Fontainian civilization for making ritual implements, and the sacred unguents within this conch chosen as a sanctified chalice have finally emerged. Symbolically, this chalice is the primordial word, the oils are the honed will, and the holy sword itself is reason, which breaks through all.

customize.text: by interacting with the "Little Fountain" in <color=#ece5d8>Annapausis</color> .
